PSXExtensionParamDef.name: template
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The template to use to format the returned items, will override the template specified by the relationship if defined. A typical use for this would be an FAQ where the same slot is rendered twice. You may specify either a name or an id.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: max_results
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The maximum number of items to return for the slot, defaults to unlimited.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: order_by
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: One or more comma separated field components. Each component names a field available in the related content objects and a direction. The syntax of this mirrors that for the JSR-170 queries.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: query
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: (Required) The JSR-170 query to use in finding the base items for the slot.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: type
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The type of the query specified, either “sql” or “xpath”. Only “sql” is officially supported. If omitted this defaults to “sql”.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: template
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: (Required) The template to use to format the returned items, you may specify either a name or an id.

PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The maximum number of items to return for the slot, defaults to unlimited.
